mapper.select: select m_rev_no mRevNo, username, m_no mNo, rating, m_rev_content, is_spo, writing_date, genre, is_blind, like_cnt, rep_cnt from m_rev where username in (select following_username from follow where following_username=#{username}) and writing_date between (select last_login_date from member u where u.username=#{username}) and sysdate;

select c.m_rev_cmnt_no mRevCmntNo, c.m_rev_no mRevNo, c.username, c.content, c.is_blind isBlind, c.writing_date writingDate from m_cmnt c, m_rev r where r.username = #{username} and r.m_rev_no = c.m_rev_no(+) and c.writing_date between (select last_login_date from member u where u.username=#{username}) and sysdate;

select l.m_rev_like_no mRevLikeNo, l.m_rev_no mRevNo, l.username, l.like_reg_date likeRegDate from m_rev_like l, m_rev r where r.username = #{username} and r.m_rev_no = l.m_rev_no(+) and l.like_reg_date between (select last_login_date from member u where u.username=#{username}) and sysdate;

select l.cmnt_like_no cmntLikeNo, l.m_rev_cmnt_no mRevCmntNo, l.username, l.like_reg_date likeRegDate from m_cmnt_like l, m_cmnt c where c.username = #{username} and c.m_rev_cmnt_no = l.m_rev_cmnt_no(+) and l.like_reg_date between (select last_login_date from member u where u.username=#{username}) and sysdate;
